column3: NACK, I believe linting fixes should be avoided. Regarding this PR, there are lots of other cases.
Agree with @promag, don't do such changes, the slow down everything while not really improving things.\nutACK 69a4339ef509da633e83fa9968ac646c58b95390
@promag @jonasschnelli thanks for feedback, I was reviewing some code in the area and noticed the missing white space and thought about a mini PR - will avoid in the future.
